name: Closer inspection
description:
Little men from space are coming!

Defend your girlfriend from the nasty aliens by poking them with your mouse, but be careful, the aliens will laser you if you anger them.

The game features some bare skin and close ups of the girlfriend!

Left clicking flashing points will reveal the aliens.

Press 1,2,3,4 or 5 to change the game's colouring.

Made for LOWREZJAM 2020
